tfse
  • Reference

break_lines

Truncates lines to a supplied width value

break_lines(x, n = 80, sep = "\\. ", collapse = "\n")

Arguments

x

Input text
n

Number of characters (width) on which to truncate given text
sep

Separator used for subunits.
y

When text is recombined into single string, this value is used as the sepator. Defaults to three line breaks.

Value

Output with line breaks optimized for n width.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
